DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective medical chart review of HIV-infected patients diagnosed with progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study of the Survival of Patients Suffering From Hiv-related Progressive Multifocal Leukoencephalopathy
DOC.criteria: HIV infected patients Diagnosed with progressive multifocal leukoencephalopathy Minimal followup of one year OR patient deceased less than one year after diagnosis Loss of followup within 12 months after diagnosis
